# Falcon Stripe Plugin

This plugin provides required UI components (for Falcon-Client based application) to handle
Stripe payments.

## Usage

```jsx
import React, { Fragment } from 'react';
import { StripePlugin, CardElement } from '@deity/falcon-stripe-plugin';
import { Box, Button, themed, FlexLayout } from '@deity/falcon-ui';
import { T } from '@deity/falcon-i18n';

const StripeCardLayout = themed({
  tag: Box,
  defaultTheme: {
    stripeCardLayout: {
      my: 'md',
      css: ({ theme }) => ({
        width: '100%',
        '.StripeElement': {
          border: theme.borders.regular,
          borderColor: theme.colors.secondaryDark,
          borderRadius: theme.borderRadius.medium,
          padding: `${theme.spacing.xs}px ${theme.spacing.sm}px`
        }
      })
    }
  }
});

export default props => (
  <StripePlugin {...props}>
    {({ handlePay }) => (
      <Fragment>
        <StripeCardLayout>
          {/* https://stripe.com/docs/stripe-js/reference#element-options */}
          <CardElement hidePostalCode />
        </StripeCardLayout>
        <FlexLayout css={{ width: '100%' }} flexDirection="row" justifyContent="space-between" mt="xs">
          <Button onClick={handlePay}>
            <T id="checkout.payAndPlaceOrder" />
          </Button>
        </FlexLayout>
      </Fragment>
    )}
  </StripePlugin>
);
```
